Package ui.drawing.composition

Class SectionGrid<T extends V,​U extends SectionComposer<V>,​V extends Section>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.drawing.composition.SectionGrid<T,​U,​V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of sections that can be stored in the grid.
    U - The type of section composer to use.
    V - The type of sections that can be stored in the section composer.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrintHandler, Section
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicSectionGrid, BufferedSectionGrid
    public abstract class SectionGrid<T extends V,​U extends SectionComposer<V>,​V extends Section>
extends DrawableSection
    Contains a reference grid of sections in a section composer.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SectionGrid

        public SectionGrid​(U composer,
                   T[][] sections)
        Constructor for SectionGrid with custom section layout.
        Parameters:
        composer - The section composer to use.
        sections - The grid of sections to store.

      • SectionGrid

        public SectionGrid​(T[][] sections)
        Constructor for SectionGrid with grid section layout. Works out the maximum size of each row and column and creates a grid based on this. If there are any responsive sections then resize them to the new size.
        Parameters:
        sections - The grid of sections to store and process.

    • Method Detail

      • getComposer

        protected abstract U getComposer​(int width,
                                 int height)
        Get a section composer instance from the implementation.
        Parameters:
        width - The width to make the composer in characters.
        height - The height to make the composer in characters.
        Returns:
        The section composer.

      • getRow

        public void getRow​(ColouredStringBuilder builder,
                   int row,
                   int startCol,
                   int maxCols)
        Generates a single line of the section to be written to the terminal. In this case pass through to the underlying section composer.
        Parameters:
        builder - ColouredStringBuilder to handle ANSI colour coding in the most efficient manner.
        row - Which row of the section to generate.
        startCol - The column of the section to start at.
        maxCols - The max number of columns to draw.

      • getRows

        public int getRows()
        Getter for number of rows. In this case pass through to the underlying section composer.
        Returns:
        The height of the section in characters.

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns()
        Getter for number of columns. In this case pass through to the underlying section composer.
        Returns:
        The width of the section in characters.

      • update

        public void update()
        Called before drawing the section. In this case update all components in the grid and the underlying composer.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Section
        Overrides:
        update in class DrawableSection

      • getSections

        public T[][] getSections()
        Getter for the grid.
        Returns:
        The grid of sections.

      • getComposer

        public U getComposer()
        Getter for the underlying composer.
        Returns:
        The underlying section composer.
